roleset.name: cause angst

role.descr: target of frustration (if in addition to arg0)

example.name: would this actually work?
example.text: Sometimes, if the hacker seemed to be into a sensitive file, he-1 would drag his keychain across the terminal *trace*-1 to create static or slow the system down *trace*-1 to frustrate his quarry.

example.name: passive
example.text: [Corporate leaders]-1, frustrated *trace*-1 by double-digit increases in health-care costs, are beginning to sound like liberal Democrats.
example.arg: by double-digit increases in health-care costs

example.text: But the Fed isn't enthusiastic about Treasury efforts to bring down the value of the dollar through intervention in foreign-exchange markets, and [the Treasury]-1 is frustrated *trace*-1 at the Fed's reluctance to cut interest rates to pull down the dollar's value.
example.arg: at the Fed's reluctance to cut interest rates to pull down the dollar's value

roleset.note: Frames file for 'frustrate' based on wsj; adjectival 'frustrating' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1

example.name: Adjectival rel: frustrating
example.text: Cutting the pieces by hand with scissors was so frustrating to her
